text: Hi there, about multi step forms... Do you know if you can insert a HubSpot form and convert it into a multi-step form in your own CMS?
I did same thing with custom JS.. you can see as an example here - <https://www.ultimatepromotions.biz/custom-challenge-coins?hs_preview=HGdXqsKY-8922407677>

has anyone ever integrated HubSpot and Acuity Scheduling? Running into some issues where we’re driving paid appointments from Google Ads and would like to have the original source pulled directly into HS

*<https://help.acuityscheduling.com/hc/en-us/articles/115006121388-Track-where-clients-are-scheduling-appointments|You need to create custom fields in aquity>* and then use that field and sync it over to a utm_source field using a tool like zapier. From there use a workflow to (re) set the original source field if they're new
let me know if you have a question
awesome, thanks <@U25C65C3S> - you da man! will set it up :thumbsup:
